message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product for $15,000. I think it would be perfect for you, and I'm excited to see what you can do with it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. However, I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement at that price?

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for a price closer to $14,000 for this product. It offers significant value, and I'm confident you'll see a return on that investment.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still looking for a price closer to my budget. Could we perhaps agree on $12,000 for the product?
